scripts.wasm2c:debug: rm build/debug.c && cd build && wasm2c debug.wasm -o debug.c
scripts.wasm2c:release: rm build/release.c && cd build && wasm2c release.wasm -o release.c
scripts.c:copy-files: rm -rf build/wasm2c && rm build/main.c && cp -r wasm2c build/ && cp main.c build/
scripts.c:build:debug: cd build && cc main.c debug.c wasm2c/wasm-rt-impl.c wasm2c/wasm-rt-mem-impl.c -Iwasm2c -lm -lpthread -I/opt/homebrew/Cellar/portaudio/19.7.0/include -L/opt/homebrew/Cellar/portaudio/19.7.0/lib -lportaudio -o debug && chmod +x debug
scripts.c:all:debug: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run wasm2c:debug && npm run c:copy-files && npm run c:build:debug && npm run c:run
